title: Pedestrian Model
desc:
The Venice Project Center's pedestrian model allows users to step through or play a visual model displaying how pedestrians move through the island on a daily basis, in particular on a work day. In addition to being able to see how pedestrians generally move around, users are free to toggle other aspects of the visualization, such as which pedestrians are tourists, and which are locals.

Click on the floating button in the bottom right-hand corner to check it out!
